Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Anthropomorphize \An`thro*po*mor"phize\, v. t. & i. To attribute a human form or personality to. [1913 Webster]
You may see imaginative children every day anthropomorphizing. --Lowell. [1913 Webster]
anthropomorphize v : ascribe human features to something [syn: {anthropomorphise}]
